nodes.text: After the mission to Arvala-7 around 9 ABY, the bounty hunter Din Djarin completed his bounty by giving Grogu to "the Client" of an Imperial remnant. Soon after, he decided to rescue Grogu, which resulted in a firefight between him and stormtroopers in their facility. After Din Djarin escaped the facility, members of the Bounty Hunters' Guild led by Greef Karga confronted him. Neither intending to relinquish, a skirmish broke out between Din Djarin and the other bounty hunters, Din killing several bounty hunters with his Amban phase-pulse blaster. Eventually, the Mandalorian group known as the Tribe joined the battle and helped the Mandalorian escape.
